plot: A Russian organized crime member falls for one of his sex traffic victims, causing an impact upon his life and the actions of his gang.
title: Red Traffic
plot_es: A Russian organized crime member falls for one of his sex traffic victims, causing an impact upon his life and the actions of his gang.
